DOC.brief_title: Academic Stress Proinflammatory Cytokines : Omega-3 Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: This study examine supplementation omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid ( key fish oil component ) affect immune mood response examination stress . This study examine outcomes medical student academic examination period well less stressful non-exam period . Participants take fish oil supplement placebo pill approximately 3 month time relevant mood , endocrine , immune measure assess . For detailed information study , please visit website http : //www.stressandhealth.org
